description: Main application component for a Tic Tac Toe game implemented in React Native, managing game state and UI.

methods.name: handleCellPress
methods.description: Handles cell press event in the tic-tac-toe board to set the player's move and check for a winner.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game board and current player's turn to the initial state.

methods.name: toggleAIMode
methods.description: Toggles between player vs player and player vs AI mode, resets the game and scores.
